head.title: Grab N, Go Meals - Fort Hancock Independent School District

div.h1:
Fort Hancock Independent School District
Success for All

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

nav.div: Fort Hancock Independent School District » COVID-19 » Grab N, Go Meals

span.style: color: black; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.span: Fort Hancock ISD will join other school districts throughout the state in remaining closed until at least Monday, May 4, as part of Texas Governor Greg Abbott’s extended executive order he signed this afternoon in an effort to continue to limit the spread of the coronavirus (COVID-19).

span.style: color: black; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.span: Please know that throughout the course of our closing, curbside meal pickups will still be offered each weekday, remote learning will continue to take place on the school’s website, and school auxiliary staff will continue to thoroughly disinfect our campuses and facilities.

span.style: color: black; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.span: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has outlined the need for all communities to implement a social distancing protocol.

span.style: color: black; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.span: Again, Fort Hancock ISD schools will remain closed until at least Monday, May 4. For the most up-to-date information, please continue to follow us on our district website at www.fhisd.net as well as our Facebook page.

span.style: color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;
color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;

p.span: and lunch meals for children 18 years of age and under on a drive through basis. Vehicles can pull up from 8:00 a.m.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(59, 59, 59);

p.span: meals for children at the same time.

strong.span:
Benito Martinez Elementary School Cafeteria
Front of Elementary Parking Lot .

p.span: those who utilize the grab and go meal service atour site to receive delivery of breakfast and
they MUST provide one of the following items
receive school meals for children who are not present

span.style: font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

li.span: Birth certificate for child(ren) not in school; or

p.span: please keep in mind that each child
entitled to only ONE breakfast and ONE
claiming multiple meals at multiple sites for the same child is not permitted.

span.style: font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(43, 43, 43);

p.span: Durante las semanas de cierre de las escuelas, las escuela

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(123, 123, 123);
font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(43, 43, 43);

span.span: s de Fort Hancock ISD ofreceran desayunos y almuerzos entre semana para ninos de 18 anos de edad y menores a traves de servicio al carro. Los vehiculos pueden detenerse de
y recibir AMBOS desayunos y almuerzos para nines al mismo tiempo.

span.style: font-size: 20px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(43, 43, 43);

strong.span: Cafeteria de la escuela primaria Benito Martinez

span.style: font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(43, 43, 43);
font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Debido a las nuevas regulaciones estatales, aquellos que utilizan el servicio de comida para llevar en el lugar para recibir el desayuno y el almuerzo para sus hijos NO necesitan tener a los nines dentro del autom6vil. Sin embargo, DEBEN proporcionar uno de los siguientes artfculos para recibir comidas escolares para nines que no estan presentes:

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

li.span: Carta oficial / correo electronico / solicitud electron
ca de la escuela que enumera a los ninos registrados en la escuela;
Boleta individual de calificaciones del estudiante;
Certificado de nacimiento para ninos que no estan registrados en la escuela; o

span.style: font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Ademas, tenga en cuenta que cada nino tiene derecho a UN solo desayuno y UN almuerzo por dia de la semana; Nose permite reclamar comidas multiples envarios sitios para el mismo nino.

p.style: font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; margin-top: 0.15pt; text-align: center;
p.span: Esperamos que esto ayude a aliviar cualquier dificultad que pueda haber experimentado durante el cierre de la escuela, y alentamos a todos amantenerse seguros y saludables en casa. Gracias por su paciencia ycomprension.
